name: Betsy Baker! or, Too Attentive by Half; A Farce, in One Act
author: Morton, John Maddison
Morton, Maddison
Morton, J. M. (John Maddison)
body:
Some inconsistencies, such as the inconsistent hyphenation of the
phrase “by the bye” and the different spellings of “pshaw”, have not
been standardized.
